Class GroqApiException

java.lang.Object
java.lang.Throwable
java.lang.Exception
com.groq.api.exceptions.GroqApiException
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable
public class GroqApiException extends Exception
Exception thrown when an error occurs during API operations.
See Also:

  • Constructor Details

    • GroqApiException

      public GroqApiException(int statusCode, String message)
      Creates a new exception with status code and message.
      Parameters:
      statusCode - The HTTP status code or error code.
      message - A descriptive error message.

    • GroqApiException

      public GroqApiException(int statusCode, String message, Throwable cause)
      Creates a new exception with status code, message, and cause.
      Parameters:
      statusCode - The HTTP status code or error code.
      message - A descriptive error message.
      cause - The underlying cause of the exception.

    • GroqApiException

      public GroqApiException(int statusCode, String message, String errorType, String errorCode, Throwable cause)
      Creates a new exception with all details.
      Parameters:
      statusCode - The HTTP status code or error code.
      message - A descriptive error message.
      errorType - The type of error returned by the API.
      errorCode - The error code returned by the API.
      cause - The underlying cause of the exception.
